main event: On 15 July 1965, an unidentified object was sighted in Dudley, Massachusetts, reported as a star-shaped disk-like object that was stationary for 15 minutes before taking off.
interesting points: The object was described as silver-yellow, about the size of a pencil at arm's length, The sighting lasted around 15-20 seconds, The object appeared to suddenly move behind clouds before disappearing, Witnesses included a reliable civilian source from Dudley, Massachusetts, and no photographs were taken during the observation.
witness description: male, 54 years old from Dudley, Massachusetts, watching with his wife while waiting for a thunderstorm.
